5.title: Python Machine Learning
5.description: Python is one of the world’s leading data science languages and this free eBook will show you how to write clean, elegant Python code to optimize the strength of your machine learning algorithms. Identifying and understanding trends and patterns within complex data is the key to modern business success, making insights and new perspectives an invaluable resource. This book will help you harness the power of Python so you can ask the right data questions, predict continuous target outcomes, organize data with pre-processing techniques, uncover patterns and structures in data with clustering, and delve deeper into textual and social media data with sentiment analysis.
